alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 11:50PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marshall, northeastern Red Lake, northwestern Beltrami, eastern Pennington, southeastern Lake of the Woods and northwestern Clearwater Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1150 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gates Corner to near High Landing. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plummer, Grygla, Goodridge, Thorhult, Carmel, Malcolm and High Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake
